ComicInfo.Series: True Lives of the Fabulous Killjoys: National Anthem
ComicInfo.Summary:
During a road-stop psychedelic, out of body experience, Killjoys leader Mike Milligram learns more about his past. Meanwhile, the old gangs and adversaries of our heroes are called together to hunt them down for a final showdown at an abandoned mall.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Leonardo Romero & Jordie Bellaire | 1 | B | Variant Cover | Becky Cloonan | 2 | C | Variant Cover | Steve Seeley | 3 |
